message.content:
1. Andrographis paniculata is a medicinal plant.
2. Andrographis paniculata has shown anti-inflammatory effects in animal models.
3. Andrographis paniculata has shown neuroprotective effects in animal models.
4. Andrographis paniculata has shown antifibrotic effects in animal models.
5. Andrographis paniculata has shown clinical efficacy in different studies.
6. Andrographis paniculata has an anti-fatigue effect in autoimmune diseases.
7. Rheumatoid arthritis is an example of an autoimmune disease where Andrographis paniculata has shown an anti-fatigue effect.

messages.content:
Statement: Andrographis paniculata (A. paniculata), a medicinal plant, has shown anti-inflammatory, neuroprotective and antifibrotic effects in animal models as well as clinical efficacy in different studies, including an anti-fatigue effect in autoimmune diseases such as rheumatoid arthritis.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
